name: Song Trash Can
description: Improved level song & SFX trash button.

auto-select-songs.name: Auto Select Songs
auto-select-songs.description: Automatically selects the songs option in the delete popup on levels with SFX or multiple songs.

auto-select-sfx.name: Auto Select SFX
auto-select-sfx.description: Automatically selects the SFX option in the delete popup on levels with SFX or multiple songs.

hide-settings-button.name: Hide Settings Button
hide-settings-button.description: Hides the settings button from the delete popups
